description: This file defines an authentication context for a React application, utilizing Supabase for authentication and user role management. It provides context to manage user sessions, roles, and authentication actions such as login and logout.

methods.name: getRoleForUser
methods.description: Fetches the role of a user based on their user ID from the 'user_roles' table.

methods.name: AuthProvider
methods.description: React component that provides authentication context including user session, role, login, and logout functions.

methods.name: useAuth
methods.description: Custom hook to access the authentication context within React components.
